data.name: lblCatTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the catalog. Default template is Catalog.htm.

data.name: lblCSColumns.Help
data.value: Enter the column number to display products.

data.name: lblCSColumnWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the column width in pixel. If the value is higher than 0, the value will be inserted to the style attribut of the corresponding table cell. For a better control display, you should set this value to 0 and use the css classes: td.StoreCategoryProductItem and td.StoreCategoryProductAlternatingItem defined in the file StoreFront.css.

data.name: lblCSContainerTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the category product container. Default template is CategoryContainer.htm.

data.name: lblCSDetailPage.Help
data.value: Select the page where is placed the Store Catalog module to display the product detail. Generally, it is the same page, unless you use multiple Store Catalog modules.

data.name: lblCSListTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the product list. Default templates are ProductList.htm and ProductListFullInfo.htm.

data.name: lblCSRepeatDirection.Help
data.value: Select the directon to display product list.

data.name: lblCSRows.Help
data.value: Enter the row number to display products.

data.name: lblCSSortBy.Help
data.value: Select the product column on which the list should be sorted.

data.name: lblCSSubCategories.Help
data.value: Check to include in the list products of the sub categories of the selected category.

data.name: lblCSThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the width of pixel products thumbnails view.

data.name: lblDefaultCategory.Help
data.value: Select the default category to display.

data.name: lblDetailTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the product detail section. Default templates are ProductDetail.htm and ProductDetailFullInfo.htm.

data.name: lblFPSColumns.Help
data.value: Enter the column number to display products.

data.name: lblFPSColumnWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the column width in pixel. If the value is higher than 0, the value will be inserted to the style attribut of the corresponding table cell. For a better control display, you should set this value to 0 and use the css classes: td.StoreFeaturedProductItem and td.StoreFeaturedProductAlternatingItem defined in the file StoreFront.css.

data.name: lblFPSContainerTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the featured product container. Default template is ListContainer.htm.

data.name: lblFPSDetailPage.Help
data.value: Select the page where is placed the Store Catalog module to display the product detail. Generally, it is the same page, unless you use multiple Store Catalog modules.

data.name: lblFPSListTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the product list. Default templates are FeaturedProduct.htm and FeaturedProduct_Small.htm.

data.name: lblFPSRepeatDirection.Help
data.value: Select the directon to display product list.

data.name: lblFPSRows.Help
data.value: Enter the row number to display products.

data.name: lblFPSThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the width of pixel products thumbnails view.

data.name: lblNPSColumns.Help
data.value: Enter the column number to display products.

data.name: lblNPSColumnWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the column width in pixel. If the value is higher than 0, the value will be inserted to the style attribut of the corresponding table cell. For a better control display, you should set this value to 0 and use the css classes: td.StoreNewProductItem and td.StoreNewProductAlternatingItem defined in the file StoreFront.css.

data.name: lblNPSContainerTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the new product container. Default template is ListContainer.htm.

data.name: lblNPSDetailPage.Help
data.value: Select the page where is placed the Store Catalog module to display the product detail. Generally, it is the same page, unless you use multiple Store Catalog modules.

data.name: lblNPSListTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the product list. Default templates are NewProduct.htm and NewProduct_Small.htm.

data.name: lblNPSRepeatDirection.Help
data.value: Select the directon to display product list.

data.name: lblNPSRows.Help
data.value: Enter the row number to display products.

data.name: lblNPSThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the thumbnail width in pixels.

data.name: lblPDSReturnPage.Help
data.value: Select the page back to the catalog. Generally, it is the same page, unless you use multiple Store Catalog modules.

data.name: lblPDSThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the thumbnail width in pixels.

data.name: lblPPSColumns.Help
data.value: Enter the column number to display products.

data.name: lblPPSColumnWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the column width in pixel. If the value is higher than 0, the value will be inserted to the style attribut of the corresponding table cell. For a better control display, you should set this value to 0 and use the css classes: td.StorePopularProductItem and td.StorePopularProductAlternatingItem defined in the file StoreFront.css.

data.name: lblPPSContainerTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the popular product container. Default template is ListContainer.htm.

data.name: lblPPSDetailPage.Help
data.value: Select the page where is placed the Store Catalog module to display the product detail. Generally, it is the same page, unless you use multiple Store Catalog modules.

data.name: lblPPSListTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the product list. Default templates are PopularProduct.htm and PopularProduct_Small.htm.

data.name: lblPPSRepeatDirection.Help
data.value: Select the directon to display product list.

data.name: lblPPSRows.Help
data.value: Enter the row number to display products.

data.name: lblPPSThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the thumbnail width in pixels.

data.name: lblShowCategoryMsg.Help
data.value: Check to display the category message.

data.name: lblShowCategoryProducts.Help
data.value: Check to display the category product section.

data.name: lblShowFeaturedProducts.Help
data.value: Check to display the featured product section.

data.name: lblShowNewProducts.Help
data.value: Check to display to display the new product section.

data.name: lblShowPopularProducts.Help
data.value: Check to display the popular product section.

data.name: lblShowProductDetail.Help
data.value: Check to display the detail product section.

data.name: lblUseDefaultCategory.Help
data.value: Check to define a default category.

data.name: lblEnableContentIndexing.Help
data.value: Check to enable content indexing by the DotNetNuke search engine. If you use several Store Catalog module, you should check this setting on ONLY one Store Catalog module instance. Otherwise, your products will indexed twice (or more) by the search engine.

data.name: lblCPSGIFBgColor.Help
data.value: Enter the hex value of the background color to use with GIF image format. Valid values: #FFFFFF, #f00, FF0000, F09, ...

data.name: lblFPSGIFBgColor.Help
data.value: Enter the hex value of the background color to use with GIF image format. Valid values: #FFFFFF, #f00, FF0000, F09, ...

data.name: lblNPSGIFBgColor.Help
data.value: Enter the hex value of the background color to use with GIF image format. Valid values: #FFFFFF, #f00, FF0000, F09, ...

data.name: lblPDSGIFBgColor.Help
data.value: Enter the hex value of the background color to use with GIF image format. Valid values: #FFFFFF, #f00, FF0000, F09, ...

data.name: lblPPSGIFBgColor.Help
data.value: Enter the hex value of the background color to use with GIF image format. Valid values: #FFFFFF, #f00, FF0000, F09, ...

data.name: lblSSListTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the search results list. Default templates is SearchResultsList.htm.

data.name: lblCSSortColumns.Help
data.value: Select the columns allowed to sort on.

data.name: lblCSSearchColumns.Help
data.value: Select the columns allowed to search on.

data.name: lblEnableImageCaching.Help
data.value: Check to enable image caching. Please uncheck while designing the Store or you will have to wait for the cache duration to see your image changes (impacted settings are size and background color for GIF images).

data.name: lblCacheDuration.Help
data.value: Enter the cache duration (in minutes) for images. Default value: 2 minutes.

data.name: lblAllowPrint.Help
data.value: When checked the default print module setting is disabled. You have to add the StorePrint.Action button to your container skin to be able to use this feature. Please read the Templating Guide for details.

data.name: lblABPSColumns.Help
data.value: Enter the column number to display products.

data.name: lblABPSColumnWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the column width in pixel. If the value is higher than 0, the value will be inserted to the style attribut of the corresponding table cell. For a better control display, you should set this value to 0 and use the css classes: td.StoreAlsoBoughtProductItem and td.StoreAlsoBoughtProductAlternatingItem defined in the file StoreFront.css.

data.name: lblABPSContainerTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the also bought product container. Default template is ListContainer.htm.

data.name: lblABPSDetailPage.Help
data.value: Select the page where is placed the Store Catalog module to display the product detail. Generally, it is the same page, unless you use multiple Store Catalog modules.

data.name: lblABPSGIFBgColor.Help
data.value: Enter the hex value of the background color to use with GIF image format. Valid values: #FFFFFF, #f00, FF0000, F09, ...

data.name: lblABPSListTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template for the product list. Default templates are AlsoBoughtProduct.htm and AlsoBoughtProduct_Small.htm.

data.name: lblABPSRepeatDirection.Help
data.value: Select the directon to display product list.

data.name: lblABPSRows.Help
data.value: Enter the row number to display products.

data.name: lblABPSThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the thumbnail width in pixels.

data.name: lblCSRepositioning.Help
data.value: If checked, when the visitor goes through the catalog repositioning is performed at the top of the module rather than at the top of the page.

data.name: lblShowAlsoBoughtProducts.Help
data.value: Check to display the also bought product section.

data.name: lblPDSCartWarning.Help
data.value: Check to display a warning message when the selected product is already in cart.
